extendedInfo.description: Public opinon polls are flawed and have been for years. They rely on professional organizations cold calling individuals for information. National and local news media report consistently on the outcomes of polls which steer public behavior. Advocacy groups use polls to their advantage declaring support for their cause based a sampling of a few hundred people. US Votes 2012 changes the face of election polling by turning it over to the crowd and live streaming the polling results. No longer are polling results done by cold calling people at home resulting in disputed and skewed results and misrepresentation. US Votes 2012 ties in polling with social participation and achievements to create a higher engagement resulting in a higher data sampling and more accurate results.Let your voice be heard, become part of the crowd!By installing the app you agree to the following Terms of Use:US Votes 2012 is an application that collects data related to your engagement and participation. There is no personal data collected, and  all statistics analysis is done only on the supplied profile, answers and achievements from within the application. By using the application you consent and allow Crowded Inc. to collect and use this data. You are encouraged to visit crowded.co to see how this data is used.Keywordsanalytics, crowd, crowded, engagement, analytics, data, surveys, usvotes, usavotes, us votes, feedback, customer evaluation, power of the crowd, mob scene, data collection, mobile, android, tablet, achievement, engaged, reward, participation, Obama, Michelle Bachmann, Newt Gingrich, Ron Paul, Rick Perry, Mitt Romney, Rick Santorum
